attributes.action: Prescription Drug Dependancy Detox Clinic on NHS
attributes.additional_details: Petition to get a detox clinic for people with a prescription drug addiction/dependency free on the NHS. As of 29/08/2013, you have to pay thousands to get into a private detox clinic and helps you get clean in a few days or go to an already established clinic which is on the NHS but is full of street drug users and just get put on methadone/alternative which takes weeks-years.
